Hide_arrows_when_there_are_multiple_mess: Hide arrows when there are multiple messages
Close_and_wont_show_again_on_refresh: Close and won't show again on refresh
The_first_articles_tag_will_be_shown_as_: The first article's tag will be shown as category.
Heading: Heading
Layout_automatically_adapts_based_on_the: Layout automatically adapts based on the number of blog posts.
Change_excerpts_by_editing_your_blog_pos: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)
Ignore_vertical_spacing_in_global_config: Ignore vertical spacing in global configuration.
Choose_original_image_ratio_to_not_cut_i: Choose "Original image ratio" to not cut images. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/theme-images#slideshow-and-banner-images)
Only_applicable_when_collection_image_is: Only applicable when collection image is used.
This_menu_wont_show_dropdown_items: This menu won't show dropdown items.
Grid_and_carousel_modes_1100_x_1400px_jp: Grid and carousel modes: 1100 x 1400px .jpg recommended / Collage mode: 1320 x 1480px .jpg recommended (highlighted image) and 1320 x 700px .jpg recommended (normal image)
If_none_is_set_collection_url_is_used: If none is set, collection URL is used.
Show_animation_when_section_becomes_visi: Show animation when section becomes visible.
Collage_mode_only_affects_desktop_and_wi: Collage mode only affects desktop, and will adapt based on number of items.
Name: Name
Separate_each_value_by_a_comma: Separate each value by a comma.
Format_yyyy_mm_dd_hh_mm_ss: Only support [ISO 8601](https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime) date and time formats, Example: 2023-06-13 13:58:00 | 2023-06-13T13:58:00+0800
Add_app_snippets_or_other_Liquid_code_to: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.
Question: Question
Shown_when_more_than_1_collection_is_fea: Shown when more than 1 collection is featured. Collection title is used if none is set.
If_empty_the_collection_URL_is_used: If empty, the collection URL is used.
Show_add_to_cart_below_info: Show add to cart below info
If_enabled_we_recommend_using_4_products: If enabled, we recommend using 4 products per row at maximum.
Create_link_to_your_contact_page_externa: Create link to your contact page, external marketplace
Each_customer_will_see_their_preferred_p: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)
Line_item_properties_are_used_to_collect: Line item properties are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart.
48px_x_48px_png_recommended_if_none_is_s: 48px x 48px .png recommended. If none is set, below icon will be used.
Use_low_stock_color_when_quantity_is_bel: Use low stock color when quantity is below the threshold. Choose 0 to always show in stock.
Label: Label
Only_applicable_for_line_item_property_o: Only applicable for line item property of type Text.
Shopify_does_not_natively_offers_a_way_t: Shopify does not natively offers a way to create a set of images per variant. This is often pretty limited when you have a lot of colors and would like to only see the images specific to a given color.
To_goes_around_that_Zalify_offers_a_hack: To goes around that, Zalify offers a hack using alt tags. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/product-media-grouping)
Only_applicable_for_line_item_property_o: Only applicable for line item property of type Checkbox.
Variant_image_mode_requires_that_all_var: Variant image mode requires that all variant have an associated image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-media/add-images-variants#add-images-to-existing-variants)
Feature_a_page_for_size_option: Feature a page for size option. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/size-chart)
First_display_the_size_chart_image_confi: First display the size chart image configured by metafield.
Show_rating_stars_even_if_there_is_no_ra: Show rating stars even if there is no rating
Feature_a_page_to_help_your_customers: Feature a page to help your customers
Video_are_muted_automatically_to_allow_a: Video are muted automatically to allow autoplay
Zoom_does_not_show_video_nor_3D_models: Zoom does not show video nor 3D models.
Allows_users_to_see_a_glimpse_of_the_adj: Allows users to see a glimpse of the adjacent slides.
Customize_image_patterns_for_specific_co: Customize image patterns for specific colors.
To_add_a_country_region_go_to_your_curre: To add a country/region, go to your [currency settings](/admin/settings/payments).
To_configure_social_media_go_to_your_soc: To configure social media, go to your social media settings.
To_add_a_language_go_to_your_language_se: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).
Privacy_bar_will_only_be_visible_if_it_f: Privacy bar will only be visible if it fulfills the conditions of the [Shopify Customer Privacy API](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/consent-tracking)
Title: Title
Caption: Caption
Select_a_different_menu_for_mobile_sideb: Select a different menu for mobile sidebar. If none is set the main menu is used.
Those_settings_apply_on_large_screen_onl: Those settings apply on large screen only
Home_page_only_For_best_results_use_an_i: Home page only. For best results, use an image section such as slideshow.
Uses_the_dimensions_set_on_your_main_log: Uses the dimensions set on your main logo.
Enter_menu_item_to_apply_a_mega_menu_dro: Enter menu item to apply a mega menu dropdown.
When_featuring_4_images_or_more_we_recom: When featuring 4 images or more, we recommend to not use any dropdown links to keep the navigation easy to use.
2800_x_1400px_jpg_recommended_Image_may_: 2800 x 1400px .jpg recommended. Image may be cut based on screen size.
1800_x_1800px_jpg_recommended_If_none_is: 1800 x 1800px .jpg recommended. If none is set, desktop image will be used.
Add_an_accent_background_color_below: Add an accent background color below.
Only_shown_if_2_text_blocks_are_set: Only shown if 2 text blocks are set
When_stack_it_is_recommended_to_use_a_mu: When stack, it is recommended to use a multiple of 6 logos.
Shopify_does_not_natively_offers_a_way_t: Shopify does not natively offers a way to create a set of bundles. To goes around that, Zalify offers a specific metafield configuration. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/quantity-discount)
If_the_customer_is_logged_in_the_country: If the customer is logged in, the country of their shipping address will be used.
To_apply_custom_recommended_products_Zal: To apply custom recommended products, Zalify offers a specific metafield configuration. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/customize-product-form-recommendations)
1200_x_600px_jpg_recommended_if_two_bloc: 1200 x 600px .jpg recommended (if two blocks), 2400 x 800px .jpg recommended (if one block)
Only_used_when_no_image_is_uploaded: Only used when no image is uploaded.
If_the_default_sorting_option_is_alphabe: If the default sorting option is alphabetical, you must change the default sorting option to the other.
Show_from_old_to_new_date: Show from old to new date
Group_name_will_be_shown_inside_selected: Group name will be shown inside selected filters.
Add_extra_information_to_push_other_coll: Add extra information to push other collections or products.
1100_x_1400px_jpg_recommended_If_none_is: 1100 x 1400px .jpg recommended. If none is set, collection image is used.
Free_shipping_notice_can_be_configured_i: Free shipping notice can be configured in global cart settings.
Customers_who_subscribe_will_have_their_: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).
Make_payment_faster_with_accelerated_pay: Make payment faster with accelerated payment buttons. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/pricing-payments/accelerated-checkout)
Previous_and_next_article_will_be_displa: Previous and next article will be displayed (if they exists).
Video_may_be_cut_to_adapt_to_the_section: Video may be cut to adapt to the section size.
Dynamic_recommendations_change_and_impro: Dynamic recommendations change and improve with time. [Learn more]https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations). You can manually select products by adding content.
Include_a_heading_that_explains_the_cont: Include a heading that explains the content.
With_this_option_disabled_the_more_produ: With this option disabled, the more products you add to the cart, the more free gifts you get.
24px_x_24px_png_recommended_If_none_is_s: 24px x 24px .png recommended. If none is set, below icon will be used.
To_show_review_add_the_official_product_: To show review, add the official Product Reviews app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)
Show_extra_text_next_to_your_product_des: Show extra text next to your product description to improve trust.
Change_theme_color_when_choosing_a_varia: Change theme color when choosing a variant color. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/customize-variant-colors)
This_block_is_used_to_display_third_part: This block is used to display third-party app. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/product-content-app-block)
Will_change_text_and_background_color: Will change text and background color.
Will_change_logo_color_only_Only_works_i: Will change logo color only. Only works if logo is .svg
Will_be_hidden_if_no_Buy_buttons_block_i: Will be hidden if no Buy buttons block is added onto the page.
Show_sticky_quick_buy_on_mobile_instead_: Show sticky quick buy on mobile instead of add to cart
Only_works_if_sticky_add_to_cart_is_enab: Only works if sticky add to cart is enabled
Dynamic_recommendations_are_based_on_the: Dynamic recommendations are based on the items in your cart. They change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)
To_change_collection_descriptions_or_col: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections](/admin/collections).
If_specified_takes_precedence_over_inlin: If specified, takes precedence over inline content.
When_selected_automatic_recommendations_: When selected, automatic recommendations do not show.
A_highlighted_tile_takes_bigger_space_On: A highlighted tile takes bigger space. Only has effect on desktop. Do not highlight more than 1 item per row.
Author: Author
1000_x_800px_jpg_recommended_Default_ima: 1000 x 800px .jpg recommended. Default image is used if none is selected. To position the hotspots precisely, switch to mobile mode.
Shown_when_multiple_looks_are_featured: Shown when multiple looks are featured.
This_feature_will_only_work_if_the_CTA_i: This feature will only work if the product, CTA icon and text is set.
Used_while_slideshow_image_is_loading: Used while slideshow image is loading
2160_x_1080px_jpg_recommended_1080_x_108: 2160 x 1080px .jpg recommended, 1080 x 1080px .jpg recommended if split
1080_x_1080px_jpg_recommended_Wont_show_: 1080 x 1080px .jpg recommended. Won't show up on mobile.
1000_x_1400px_jpg_recommended_If_none_is: 1000 x 1400px .jpg recommended. If none is set, desktop image will be used.
Leave_the_Button_1_text_and_Button_2_set: Leave the "Button 1 text" and "Button 2" settings empty to make the slide fully clickable.
label: label
Section_size_will_adjust_to_the_tallest_: Section size will adjust to the tallest content. Try to keep each testimonial a similar size.
Video_bubble_info: Appears only when preview video or cover image is set
Preview_video_info: When the preview video and preview video url exist at the same time, only the preview video will be displayed
Main_video_info: When the main video and main video address exist at the same time, only the main video will be displayed
2000_x_1125px_jpg_recommended_Required_i: 2000 x 1125px .jpg recommended. Required if you turn off autoplay.
Video_is_muted_automatically_to_allow_au: Video is muted automatically to allow autoplay.
Block_IPs_in_China_and_Hong_Kong: Block IPs in China and Hong Kong
Block_peers_to_view_bestselling_products: Block peers to view best-selling products
Adapt_the_theme_to_your_brand_style_by_c: Adapt the theme to your brand style by changing rounded elements, spacing and icons style.
Impact_the_vertical_spacing_separating_e: Impact the vertical spacing separating each section.
This_section_is_only_available_on_mobile: This section is only available on mobile.
Section_is_hidden_if_no_products_have_be: Section is hidden if no products have been visited.
Use_a_color_close_to_the_main_background: Use a color close to the main background.
Selecting_different_fonts_can_affect_the: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)
If_the_font_is_only_available_in_Google_: If the font is only available in [Google Fonts](https://fonts.google.com/), you can enter the font name directly.
Cart_and_checkout_prices_always_show_cur: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.
Users_who_configured_their_preferences_t: Users who configured their preferences to minimize non-essential motion will automatically experience reduced animations.
Affect_various_images_that_are_slowly_zo: Affect various images that are slowly zoomed on hover
Reveal_blog_posts_one_by_one: Reveal blog posts one by one
Affect_product_pages_and_featured_produc: Affect product pages and featured product section
Each_rule_must_be_in_its_own_line_learn_: Each rule must be in its own line. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/customize-variant-colors)
To_display_a_rating_add_a_product_rating: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/third-party-app-ratings)
This_only_affects_the_product_card_varia: This only affects the product card. Variant image mode requires that all variant have an associated image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-media/add-images-variants#add-images-to-existing-variants)
Collection_results_currently_only_show_o: Collection results currently only show on predictive search.
Make_sure_that_you_have_properly_configu: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping).
Enter_amount_using_number_only_if_using_: Enter amount using number only. If using multiple currencies, separate each currency code with its amount (eg.: USD:50, EUR:60, JPY:9000)
You_can_grab_client_id_from_official_doc: You can grab client ID from [official documentation](https://developer.paypal.com/docs/checkout/save-payment-methods/).
Instead_of_shopifys_auto_rendering_you_c: Instead of Shopify's auto-rendering, you can choose which payment methods to display. [Learn more](https://www.zalify.com/theme/help/customize-payments-icons)
Find_all_available_payment_methods_from_: Find all available payment methods from [here](https://github.com/activemerchant/payment_icons/tree/master/app/assets/images/payment_icons)
Max_width_is_500px_min_width_is_100px_ma: Max width is 500px, min width is 100px.
Apply_discount_code_before_checkout_info: In some cases, this feature may not work properly, please enable it with caution.
